synopsis.text:
Queen candidates Chocolat and Vanilla, two young witches from the Magical Kingdom, embark on a thrilling journey to the Human World to prove their worthiness for the throne. In this realm, they must capture the hearts of humans, with the witch collecting the most being crowned the victor. While outgoing Chocolat was beloved in the Magical Kingdom, her assertive demeanor struggles to win favor in her new surroundings, where her introverted best friend-turned-rival Vanilla charms the populace.

As they navigate the trials of friendship, competition, and the perils of losing their hearts to humans, Chocolat and Vanilla attend school in the Human World, forging connections and uncovering the mysteries of love. With the threat of Ogres looming over their Magical Kingdom, the pair must also work with their knights to safeguard their home.

Join Chocolat and Vanilla on their enchanting adventure filled with transformation, romance, and rivalry, as they strive to become the next queen while balancing the challenges of their new lives in the Human World.
